document.full_text: christina mchale, of englewood cliffs, n.j., came within two points of victory, only to squander a 5-0 third-set lead and yield, 6-7 (4), 6-2, 9-7, to sara errani of italy on monday at the french open.
document.title: mchale falls to errani in seesaw struggle
lines_and_colors: christina mchale, of englewood cliffs, n.j., came within two points of victory, only to squander a 5-0 third-set lead and yield, 6-7 (4), 6-2, 9-7, to sara errani of italy on monday at the french open.
